text: The Wound of Separation () is a 1959 Turkish romantic drama film directed by Metin Erksan. It stars Sadri Alisik, Mualla Kaynak, and Nese Yulaç. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1959 films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish romantic drama films Category:1959 romantic drama films Category:Films directed by Metin Erksan Category:1959 drama films
title: The Wound of Separation
